title: Anyone else have problems installing the update? It sent my PC into a BSOD loop 😭
selftext: I tried to log on last night, but got the same error I got last wipe. Ran the verify files thing in Steam. It found and "fixed" the problem. I tried to log on again. Blue screen of death. I uninstalled Rust, Steam, graphics drivers, and even did a system restore. I'm still getting the BSOD every 20 seconds or so. Wtf?
